description:
Kazuma is up against his most powerful foe yet, the famous TV celebrity and comedian Norihei Miki! Can Kazuma possibly compete against such a legend, especially when the theme involves using seaweed, Norihei’s specialty?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Duel de pains au nori ! Contre une célébrité !
Nori Bread Battle!! A Super Famous Celebrity Appears!
Nori Pan Taiketsu!! Chou Yumeijin ga Derun Desu yo!
ศึกขนมปังสาหร่าย!! คนดังโผล่มาแล้ว
海苔パン対決!! 超有名人が出るんですよ!
